title: After the Twelfth Night
description: Antonio was a pirate, and now he's in jail for that long-ago sea fight with the Duke.His friend, Sebastian, was supposed to bail him out of jail, but Sebastian has been kidnapped! Antonio promises Sebastian's wife that he will find her missing husband, but first he must get out of jail...In A.G. Werff's debut novel, you will find humor, heroes with sidekicks, villains with henchmen, pirates, love, peril, adventure, and lots of treasure!
author: Abbey Stellingwerff
